name: Manual required - security concern
description: Security-related issues should require manual review

input.title: PDF with malicious JavaScript executes code
input.body:
## Security Issue

I discovered that PDFs containing embedded JavaScript can execute code when processed by the library.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Create a PDF with embedded JavaScript
2. Process it with opendataloader-pdf
3. The JavaScript appears to be evaluated

## Impact
This could allow arbitrary code execution through malicious PDF files.

## Suggested Fix
Disable or sandbox JavaScript evaluation during PDF processing.
